## Primeval Deities

<center>
![](images/primeval_deities.png){style="width:150px"}
</center>
<br>
A website to host faction information of the Primeval deities for the [FIST RPG](https://claymorerpgs.itch.io/fist). Contains missions, lore, and a "bestiary".

Link: [https://m-gemmell.github.io/Primeval_Deities_FIST/](https://m-gemmell.github.io/Primeval_Deities_FIST/)

## The Aurora's Avarice

<center>
![](images/aurora.png){style="width:100px"}
</center>
<br>
A Mystery for the RPG [Monster of the Week](https://evilhat.com/product/monster-of-the-week/). It includes a skiing mouintain town on the off season, a cult, and giant Ice worms.

Link: [https://m-gemmell.github.io/RPGs/Monster_of_the_week/The_auroras_avarice/01-The_auroras_avarice.html](https://m-gemmell.github.io/RPGs/Monster_of_the_week/The_auroras_avarice/01-The_auroras_avarice.html)
